Button.description: Hardware Abstraction for Buttons. It provides an easy way of handling buttons.

isPressed.description: Return true if the button has been pressed

clicked.description: Return > 0 if the button is clicked, or 0 if not.

buttonPin.description: buttonPin  sets the pin that this switch is connected to

buttonMode.description: buttonMode indicates BUTTON_PULLUP or BUTTON_PULLDOWN resistor

LED.description: Hardware Abstraction for LEDs. It provides an easy way of handling LEDs.

ledPin.description: ledPin the pin connected to this LED

buttonMode.description: buttonMode indicates BUTTON_PULLUP or BUTTON_PULLDOWN resistor
